verses.verse: And this<WH2063> is the blessing,<WH1293> wherewith<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> blessed<WH1288> <WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> before<WH6440> his death.<WH4194>

And he said,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> came<WH935> from Sinai,<WH4480> <WH5514> and rose up<WH2224> from Seir<WH4480> <WH8165> unto them; he shined forth<WH3313> from mount<WH4480> <WH2022> Paran,<WH6290> and he came<WH857> with ten thousands<WH4480> <WH7233> of saints:<WH6944> from his right hand<WH4480> <WH3225> went a fiery<WH784> law<WH1881> for them.

Yea, <WH637> he loved<WH2245> the people;<WH5971> all<WH3605> his saints<WH6918> are in thy hand:<WH3027> and they<WH1992> sat down<WH8497> at thy feet;<WH7272> every one shall receive<WH5375> of thy words.<WH4480> <WH1703>
Moses <WH4872> commanded<WH6680> us a law,<WH8451> even the inheritance<WH4181> of the congregation<WH6952> of Jacob.<WH3290>
And he was<WH1961> king<WH4428> in Jeshurun,<WH3484> when the heads<WH7218> of the people<WH5971> and the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> were gathered<WH622> together.<WH3162>
Let Reuben<WH7205> live,<WH2421> and not<WH408> die;<WH4191> and let not his men<WH4962> be<WH1961> few.<WH4557>

And this<WH2063> is the blessing of Judah:<WH3063> and he said,<WH559> Hear,<WH8085> LORD,<WH3068> the voice<WH6963> of Judah,<WH3063> and bring<WH935> him unto<WH413> his people:<WH5971> let his hands<WH3027> be sufficient<WH7227> for him; and be<WH1961> thou a help<WH5828> to him from his enemies.<WH4480> <WH6862>

And of Levi<WH3878> he said,<WH559> Let thy Thummim<WH8550> and thy Urim<WH224> be with thy holy<WH2623> one,<WH376> whom<WH834> thou didst prove<WH5254> at Massah,<WH4532> and with whom thou didst strive<WH7378> at<WH5921> the waters<WH4325> of Meribah;<WH4809>

Who said<WH559> unto his father<WH1> and to his mother,<WH517> I have not<WH3808> seen<WH7200> him; neither<WH3808> did he acknowledge<WH5234> his brethren,<WH251> nor<WH3808> knew<WH3045> his own children:<WH1121> for<WH3588> they have observed<WH8104> thy word,<WH565> and kept<WH5341> thy covenant.<WH1285>

They shall teach<WH3384> Jacob<WH3290> thy judgments,<WH4941> and Israel<WH3478> thy law:<WH8451> they shall put<WH7760> incense<WH6988> before<WH639> thee, and whole burnt sacrifice<WH3632> upon<WH5921> thine altar.<WH4196>

Bless, <WH1288> LORD,<WH3068> his substance,<WH2428> and accept<WH7521> the work<WH6467> of his hands:<WH3027> smite through<WH4272> the loins<WH4975> of them that rise against<WH6965> him, and of them that hate<WH8130> him, that<WH4480> they rise not again.<WH6965>

And of Benjamin<WH1144> he said,<WH559> The beloved<WH3039> of the LORD<WH3068> shall dwell<WH7931> in safety<WH983> by<WH5921> him; and the LORD shall cover<WH2653> <WH5921> him all<WH3605> the day<WH3117> long, and he shall dwell<WH7931> between<WH996> his shoulders.<WH3802>

And of Joseph<WH3130> he said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> of the LORD<WH3068> be his land,<WH776> for the precious things<WH4480> <WH4022> of heaven,<WH8064> for the dew,<WH4480> <WH2919> and for the deep<WH4480> <WH8415> that coucheth<WH7257> beneath,<WH8478>
And for the precious<WH4480> <WH4022> fruits<WH8393> brought forth by the sun,<WH8121> and for the precious things<WH4480> <WH4022> put forth<WH1645> by the moon,<WH3391>
And for the chief things<WH4480> <WH7218> of the ancient<WH6924> mountains,<WH2042> and for the precious things<WH4480> <WH4022> of the lasting<WH5769> hills,<WH1389>

And for the precious things<WH4480> <WH4022> of the earth<WH776> and fullness<WH4393> thereof, and for the good will<WH7522> of him that dwelt<WH7931> in the bush:<WH5572> let the blessing come<WH935> upon the head<WH7218> of Joseph,<WH3130> and upon the top of the head<WH6936> of him that was separated<WH5139> from his brethren.<WH251>

His glory<WH1926> is like the firstling<WH1060> of his bullock,<WH7794> and his horns<WH7161> are like the horns<WH7161> of unicorns:<WH7214> with them he shall push<WH5055> the people<WH5971> together<WH3162> to the ends<WH657> of the earth:<WH776> and they<WH1992> are the ten thousands<WH7233> of Ephraim,<WH669> and they<WH1992> are the thousands<WH505> of Manasseh.<WH4519>
And of Zebulun<WH2074> he said,<WH559> Rejoice,<WH8055> Zebulun,<WH2074> in thy going out;<WH3318> and, Issachar,<WH3485> in thy tents.<WH168>

They shall call<WH7121> the people<WH5971> unto the mountain;<WH2022> there<WH8033> they shall offer<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> of righteousness:<WH6664> for<WH3588> they shall suck<WH3243> of the abundance<WH8228> of the seas,<WH3220> and of treasures<WH8226> hid<WH2934> in the sand.<WH2344>

And of Gad<WH1410> he said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be he that enlargeth<WH7337> Gad:<WH1410> he dwelleth<WH7931> as a lion,<WH3833> and teareth<WH2963> the arm<WH2220> with<WH637> the crown of the head.<WH6936>

And he provided<WH7200> the first part<WH7225> for himself, because<WH3588> there,<WH8033> in a portion<WH2513> of the lawgiver,<WH2710> was he seated;<WH5603> and he came<WH857> with the heads<WH7218> of the people,<WH5971> he executed<WH6213> the justice<WH6666> of the LORD,<WH3068> and his judgments<WH4941> with<WH5973> Israel.<WH3478>
And of Dan<WH1835> he said,<WH559> Dan<WH1835> is a lion's<WH738> whelp:<WH1482> he shall leap<WH2187> from<WH4480> Bashan.<WH1316>

And of Naphtali<WH5321> he said,<WH559> O Naphtali,<WH5321> satisfied<WH7649> with favor,<WH7522> and full<WH4392> with the blessing<WH1293> of the LORD:<WH3068> possess<WH3423> thou the west<WH3220> and the south.<WH1864>

And of Asher<WH836> he said,<WH559> Let Asher<WH836> be blessed<WH1288> with children;<WH4480> <WH1121> let him be<WH1961> acceptable<WH7521> to his brethren,<WH251> and let him dip<WH2881> his foot<WH7272> in oil.<WH8081>
Thy shoes<WH4515> shall be iron<WH1270> and brass;<WH5178> and as thy days,<WH3117> so shall thy strength<WH1679> be.
There is none<WH369> like unto the God<WH410> of Jeshurun,<WH3484> who rideth upon<WH7392> the heaven<WH8064> in thy help,<WH5828> and in his excellency<WH1346> on the sky.<WH7834>

The eternal<WH6924> God<WH430> is thy refuge,<WH4585> and underneath<WH4480> <WH8478> are the everlasting<WH5769> arms:<WH2220> and he shall thrust out<WH1644> the enemy<WH341> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> thee; and shall say,<WH559> Destroy<WH8045> them.

Israel <WH3478> then shall dwell<WH7931> in safety<WH983> alone:<WH910> the fountain<WH5869> of Jacob<WH3290> shall be upon<WH413> a land<WH776> of corn<WH1715> and wine;<WH8492> also<WH637> his heavens<WH8064> shall drop down<WH6201> dew.<WH2919>

Happy <WH835> art thou, O Israel:<WH3478> who<WH4310> is like unto thee,<WH3644> O people<WH5971> saved<WH3467> by the LORD,<WH3068> the shield<WH4043> of thy help,<WH5828> and who<WH834> is the sword<WH2719> of thy excellency!<WH1346> and thine enemies<WH341> shall be found liars<WH3584> unto thee; and thou<WH859> shalt tread<WH1869> upon<WH5921> their high places.<WH1116>
